workshoptitle: Everything You Never Knew About Oracle

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Everything You Never Knew About Oracle.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Microservices with Oracle
tutorials.description: Get to know the Customer Service microservice, Spring Boot and Oracle

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Exploring REST capabilities
tutorials.description: Explore the Support Ticket service and Spring Boot REST capabilities with Oracle

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Event processing with TxEventQ
tutorials.description: Learn about event-driven processing with TxEventQ and OKafka

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Exploring AI functionality
tutorials.description: Learn about Oracle Vector Database and OCI GenAI service

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Exploring JSON Relational Duality Views
Lab 6: Exploring Oracle REST Data Services
Cleanup the environment
tutorials.description: Lab where cleanup the deployed environment

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
